sentences.en: Attila, king of Hun, Apparel, armour of gold , He, great conqueror!
sentences.cn: 匈奴的王阿提拉, 全身披着金色铠甲, 伟大的征服者!

sentences.en: He easily overcame Garcia, Saturday's conqueror of Ernie Els.
sentences.cn: 他轻松战胜了星期六击败厄尼·埃尔斯的加西亚。

sentences.en: He is the greatest conqueror who has conquered himself.
sentences.cn: 战胜自己的人,是最伟大的战胜者.

sentences.en: He said he would never grovel before a conqueror.
sentences.cn: 他说他永远不会在征服者脚下摇尾乞怜.

sentences.en: The captives prostrated themselves before the conqueror.
sentences.cn: 俘虏们俯伏在征服者面前.

sentences.en: The conquered rendered tribute to the conqueror.
sentences.cn: 被征服者向征服者纳贡.

sentences.en: The conqueror dictated terms to the surrender.
sentences.cn: 战胜者向俘虏提出条件.

sentences.en: The conqueror dictated the surrender terms.
sentences.cn: 占领者提出投降的条件.

sentences.en: The conqueror governed his new subjects with an iron scepter.
sentences.cn: 征服者以铁腕统治其新臣民.

sentences.en: The conqueror passed over the bodies into the city.
sentences.cn: 得胜的军队跨过死者尸首向城市进军.

sentences.en: The conqueror tried to make the natives abjure their religion.
sentences.cn: 征服者试著让当地人宣誓放弃他们的宗教.

sentences.en: The people of an oppressed country obey their conquerors because they want to go on living.
sentences.cn: 一个被压迫国家的人民顺从他们的征服者，是因为他们想活下去。

sentences.en: They abandoned the city to the conqueror.
sentences.cn: 他们把那个城市丢弃给征服者.

sentences.en: We shall never surrender to a conqueror.
sentences.cn: 我们决不向征服者投降.

sentences.en: We shall never yield to a conqueror.
sentences.cn: 我们永远不会向征服者低头.

sentences.en: William the Conqueror, ie King William I of England.
sentences.cn: 征服者威廉(英国国王威廉一世).

phrases.tran_cn: 征服者威廉（英国国王威廉一世，等于William I）

trans.tran_en: The conquerors of a country or group of people are the people who have taken complete control of that country or group's land
